Description: The Temptation of St Antony. Interior of a cave with a woman offering food and drink to the saint, a crone with wings pulling at his habit, a variety of monsters surrounding the saint and tormenting him; after Antonie van den Heuvel Etching
Bibliographic references: Hollstein / Dutch and Flemish etchings, engravings and woodcuts c.1450-1700 (3)
Associated names: Representation of: St Antony of Egypt
Acquisition name: Purchased from: Capt Edward G Spencer-Churchill
